tachyon.worker.block

Class BlockWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.block.BlockWorker

  • public final class BlockWorker
extends Object
    The class is responsible for managing all top level components of the Block Worker, including: Servers: BlockServiceHandler (RPC Server), BlockDataServer (Data Server) Periodic Threads: BlockMasterSync (Worker to Master continuous communication) Logic: BlockDataManager (Logic for all block related storage operations)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlockWorker()
      Creates a Tachyon Block Worker.

        public NetAddress getWorkerNetAddress()
        Gets this worker's NetAddress, which is the worker's hostname, rpc server port, and data server port
        Returns:
        the worker's net address

      • process

        public void process()
        Runs the block worker. The thread calling this will be blocked until the thrift server shuts down.

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws IOException
        Stops the block worker. This method should only be called to terminate the worker.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the data server fails to close.
